extendedInfo.description: Enter the Monkey Boxing League with Monkey Boxing! Step inside the ring, do powerful K.O.s and combos, customize your monkey, and compete for HUGE Trophies! FEATURES: High quality 3d Graphics: Fully animated 3D characters with dynamic accurate lighting. Funny to Play: Ludicrous characters and fast paced, crazy gameplay. Customization: Create your own Monkey Boxer choosing colors and wearable props up to more than 269 BILLIONS of combinations. Unlockable Items: Win new wearable props beating loudicrous âfamousâ monkey boxers. Addictive Gameplay: Challenge yourself and others to get the best score on infinite game levels. Training: Train your monkey to get best boxing performances. Lots of Levels: Win the WMB Cup playing the first 50 levels and then continue fighting for an unlimited number of matches. 2 Players Option: Challenge a friend on the same device or via Wi-fi.Great monkey sound effects and funny gameplay! Tablets supported.4 Languages support: English, Spanish, French, Italian

reviews.title: WIFI
reviews.comment: This game could be fun by 2 players. but wifi battle is so unstable, 1/10 success rate of connecting to another player.  please make it bluetooth playable.
reviews.author: m liao

reviews.title: I should have known better ...
reviews.comment: I picked this up to try 2 player with a friend. After about 30 minutes I was tired of it. The 2 player seemed responsive on his home WiFi, but there really isn\'t much here in terms of gameplay: block, punch, and some quick time events. At $3, it\'s not really worth it.
reviews.author: Jeff Francis

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: it\'s really fun and I play it everyday! also the 3D graphics are awesome.  if you like great action games, this is for you. also i wish there was a way to have matches with your friends over bluetooth. BUY THIS GAME!
reviews.author: Luke Weiner

reviews.title: Gameplay sucks.
reviews.comment: Although this game looks good, it is really boring and rather stupid. You can\'t make punch combos; rather, you press a button over and over while your character does random punches. Not worth 3 bucks. Don\'t buy it.
reviews.author: Valerie Elaine

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Such a fun game to play good defo buy this happy is wrath it download
reviews.author: lukey b

reviews.title: Amesome
reviews.comment: It is so good I have all most finished the game. If I was you I would buy this game when you see it :-) :-)
reviews.author: Daniel Wright

reviews.title: LOAD OF FUN!!
reviews.comment: just fun time playing this app.
reviews.author: Victor Roa

reviews.title: NICE GRAPHICS
reviews.comment: Nice looking game. No issues or problems so far. I like all the customization you are allowed. Game plays really well too. Being on a mobile device or tablet they made the game work and play well. I hope updates continue to keep this game fresh and working good.
reviews.author: David Barajas

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Well I think this game is quite cool and very entertaining, so it\'s a thumbs up for me!!! Planet of the apes...hahaha.
reviews.author: ivan chakraborty

reviews.title: nice and smooth
reviews.comment: I really enjoy the gameplay but it lacks a certain hook due to repetitive button mashing. the game does progressively gets harder and has a really cool multiplayer option. the reason for the missing star is I hate that challenge thing I never win and spinning the wheel is nearly impossible giving me useless hand cramps. change that please
reviews.author: g gen

reviews.title: Monkey around
reviews.comment: A fun but less ambitious title from Crescent Moon Games.  The gameplay is simple, but suprisingly deep.  Punching and blocking seems easy, but the timing of these two moves is what counts.  The graphics are clean and crisp and the sound compliments the gameplay nicely.  Unlocking new outfits is fun and the training between matches is a nice toutch.  Playing against real opponents over wi-fi works fine and is a welcome addition to a solid game. Fun for a few minutes or a few hours. Playtime 5.5 hours. Thanks
reviews.author: Mark Toutant

reviews.title: Good, but please fix the challenge
reviews.comment: Fun game, but the challenge part is impossible. I have never won it and have suffered cramps from trying. Please please fix this and I would be happy to rate it a 4 or 5 star.
reviews.author: Scott Keller

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: It\'s an okay game but considering what we usually get for the prices here, I could only give it 5 stars if it was $1.  At $3 it\'s just pretty good.  If there was IAP I\'d down vote it to 3 stars but since it\'s the full game with no sneaky IAP it settles nicely at 4.  Except for some special moves and finishing off, there are only two main boxing buttons (punch & block).  You can figure out timing of the punch button presses tho to have a little more control over the type of punch being thrown.  There is training between matches too after a bit that let\'s you try to raise one of the three main stats.  Edit - Challenge was changed so you can win without it (you still do at least one but it doesn\'t happen non stop anymore even if you totally dominate the match).  So that complaint is gone.  Is actually pretty fun overall too.
reviews.author: Summer LaRose

reviews.title: Really a peeling
reviews.comment: Dont be a chump be a chimp :-)
reviews.author: Michael gamer

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Good harmless fun..just as an app should be..no in app purchase bull .you buy the full game for a change...
reviews.author: Paul Cudby

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: What a great game especially on multi player. Get it and beat a monkey.
reviews.author: Andy Williams

reviews.comment: The only app that had me laughing. ..non stop
reviews.author: Lewis Wingrove
